# dpads

**Instance Property**

The device’s directional pads as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

## Declaration

```swift
var dpads: GCPhysicalInputElementCollection<any GCDirectionPadElement> { get }
```

## Accessing elements

- **elements**: The device’s elements as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **axes**: The device’s axes as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **buttons**: The device’s buttons as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **switches**: The device’s switches as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **subscript(_:)**: Returns the element that the key specifies.

items.description: The device’s elements as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
items.name: elements

items.description: The device’s axes as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
items.name: axes
